Class ERTPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.ERTPoint

    IPoint<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ERTTrainingPoint

    public class ERTPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPoint<java.lang.String>
    Class representing an ERTPoint using strings as feature names.
